channel.title: Pods of the Multiverse
channel.description:
Join four friends as they explore the multiverse through various D&D settings. Each season will take place in adifferent setting, with a different DM, and a distinctly different flavor.

New episodes drop every Monday.

Support Pods of the Multiverse on Patreon
Join our Discord Server
Follow @multiverse_pod on Twitter
channel.copyright: This work is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike 4.0 International License.

item.title: S1 E9 - The Triad of Fates
item.itunes:title: The Triad of Fates
item.description:
Klyx confronts Lyucar. Gron leads the Akroans into battle against Hargot. Endromide suffers the consequences ofopening the Pyxis of Pandemonium. Gods and mortals alike look on in suspense as the fate of Akros is decided.

Andy Burger, Dungeon Master
Jimmy Affatigato as Gron
J. Scala as Endromide
Geppi Iaia as Klyx

Produced by Jimmy Affatigato
Edited by J. Scala
Music by Andy Burger
Art by Alexa Reilly

Support Pods of the Multiverse on Patreon
Join our Discord Server
Follow @multiverse_pod on Twitter
item.itunes:author: Pods of the Multiverse
item.itunes:summary: Klyx confronts Lyucar. Gron leads the Akroans into battle against Hargot. Endromide suffers the consequences of opening the Pyxis of Pandemonium. Gods and mortals alike look on in suspense as the fate of Akros is decided.

item.title: S1 E8 - Solemn Reunions
item.itunes:title: Solemn Reunions
item.description:
The party navigates the unseen passages beneath an overrun Akros to reach the safety of the Kolophon. Gron catchesup with his brother. Klyx calls in a favor. Endromide struggles to keep their mouth shut.

Andy Burger, Dungeon Master
Jimmy Affatigato as Gron
J. Scala as Endromide
Geppi Iaia as Klyx

Produced by Jimmy Affatigato
Edited by J. Scala
Music by Andy Burger
Art by Alexa Reilly

Support Pods of the Multiverse on Patreon
Join our Discord Server
Follow @multiverse_pod on Twitter
item.itunes:author: Pods of the Multiverse
item.itunes:summary: The party navigates the unseen passages beneath an overrun Akros to reach the safety of the Kolophon. Gron catches up with his brother. Klyx calls in a favor. Endromide struggles to keep their mouth shut.

item.title: S1 E7 - A Pandemonic Passage
item.itunes:title: A Pandemonic Passage
item.description:
Deadly foes pursue our heroes across the Ashlands and the Phoberos as they attempt to return to Akros. Klyx guidesthe party through the shadows. Gron leaps to the defense of his lifelong companion. Endromide learns a terriblesecret.

Andy Burger, Dungeon Master
Jimmy Affatigato as Gron
J. Scala as Endromide
Geppi Iaia as Klyx

Produced by Jimmy Affatigato
Music by Andy Burger
Art by Alexa Reilly

Support Pods of the Multiverse on Patreon
Join our Discord Server
Follow @multiverse_pod on Twitter
item.itunes:author: Pods of the Multiverse
item.itunes:summary: Deadly foes pursue our heroes across the Ashlands and the Phoberos as they attempt to return to Akros. Klyx guides the party through the shadows. Gron leaps to the defense of his lifelong companion. Endromide learns a terrible secret.

item.title: S1 E6 - Into the Ashlands
item.itunes:title: Into the Ashlands
item.description:
Our heroes journey across the cursed Ashlands in search of a lost temple to Klothys. The terror and sorrowsaturating these vesuvian fields have drawn all manner of evil to them. Can Klyx, Gron and Endromide survive thejourney and banish the dark forces within the temple?

Andy Burger, Dungeon Master
Jimmy Affatigato as Gron
J. Scala as Endromide
Geppi Iaia as Klyx

Produced by Jimmy Affatigato
Edited by J. Scala
Music by Andy Burger
Art by Alexa Reilly

Support Pods of the Multiverse on Patreon
Join our Discord Server
Follow @multiverse_pod on Twitter
item.itunes:author: Pods of the Multiverse
item.itunes:summary: Our heroes journey across the cursed Ashlands in search of a lost temple to Klothys. The terror and sorrow saturating these vesuvian fields have drawn all manner of evil to them. Can Klyx, Gron and Endromide survive the journey and banish the dark forces within the temple?

item.title: S1 E5 - Hardened in the Forge
item.itunes:title: Hardened in the Forge
item.description:
Klyx, Gron and Endromide escape through the mines of Mt. Velus only to stare down new dangers in One-Eyed Pass. Theparty is invited to join two feasts.

Andy Burger, Dungeon Master
Jimmy Affatigato as Gron
J. Scala as Endromide
Geppi Iaia as Klyx

Produced by Jimmy Affatigato
Music by Andy Burger
Art by Alexa Reilly

Support Pods of the Multiverse on Patreon
Join our Discord Server
Follow @multiverse_pod on Twitter
item.itunes:author: Pods of the Multiverse
item.itunes:summary: Klyx, Gron and Endromide escape through the mines of Mt. Velus only to stare down new dangers in One-Eyed Pass. The party is invited to join two feasts.

item.title: S1 E4 - Trials of Mt. Velus
item.itunes:title: Trials of Mt. Velus
item.description:
Endromide, Gron and Klyx journey to the workshop of the forge-god, only to find that the temple is about to beflooded with magma. Will the heroes be able to overcome the volcano’s guardians and escape with its treasures intime?

Andy Burger, Dungeon Master
Jimmy Affatigato as Gron
J. Scala as Endromide
Geppi Iaia as Klyx

Produced by Jimmy Affatigato
Music by Andy Burger
Art by Alexa Reilly

Support Pods of the Multiverse on Patreon
Join our Discord Server
Follow @multiverse_pod on Twitter
item.itunes:author: Pods of the Multiverse
item.itunes:summary: Endromide, Gron and Klyx journey to the workshop of the forge-god, only to find that the temple is about to be flooded with magma. Will the heroes be able to overcome the volcano’s guardians and escape with its treasures in time?

item.title: S1 E3 - Omens in the Flames
item.itunes:title: Omens in the Flames
item.description:
Endromide reunites with their former mentors. Gron apologizes for breaking a dog. Klyx stuffs some lamb shanks uphis sleeve. All of our heroes receive dire prognostications of the trials they must overcome if Akros is to besaved.

Andy Burger, Dungeon Master
Jimmy Affatigato as Gron
J. Scala as Endromide
Geppi Iaia as Klyx

Produced by Jimmy Affatigato
Music by Andy Burger
Art by Alexa Reilly

Support Pods of the Multiverse on Patreon
Join our Discord Server
Follow @multiverse_pod on Twitter
item.itunes:author: Pods of the Multiverse
item.itunes:summary: Endromide reunites with their former mentors. Gron apologizes for breaking a dog. Klyx stuffs some lamb shanks up his sleeve. All of our heroes receive dire prognostications of the trials they must overcome if Akros is to be saved.

item.title: S1 E2 - Rocky Beginnings
item.itunes:title: Rocky Beginnings
item.description:
The newly formed party make their way to the Citadel of Akros, only to learn that their destiny leads them up theperilous paths into the Katachthon mountains. The rugged wilderness tests the breadth of Gron, Klyx and Endromide’sabilities.

Andy Burger, Dungeon Master
Jimmy Affatigato as Gron
J. Scala as Endromide
Geppi Iaia as Klyx

Produced by Jimmy Affatigato
Music by Andy Burger
Art by Alexa Reilly

Support Pods of the Multiverse on Patreon
Join our Discord Server
Follow @multiverse_pod on Twitter
item.itunes:author: Pods of the Multiverse
item.itunes:summary: The newly formed party make their way to the Citadel of Akros, only to learn that their destiny leads them up the perilous paths into the Katachthon mountains. The rugged wilderness tests the breadth of Gron, Klyx and Endromide’s abilities.

item.title: S1 E1 - The Red Thread of Fate
item.itunes:title: The Red Thread of Fate
item.description:
When the polis of Akros is assaulted by an army of minotaurs and giants; a captive warrior, an oracle, and a thiefare brought together by the chaos of battle and the goddess of Destiny.

Andy Burger, Dungeon Master
Jimmy Affatigato as Gron
J. Scala as Endromide
Geppi Iaia as Klyx

Produced by Jimmy Affatigato
Music by Andy Burger
Art by Alexa Reilly

Support Pods of the Multiverse on Patreon
Join our Discord Server
Follow @multiverse_pod on Twitter
item.itunes:author: Pods of the Multiverse
item.itunes:summary: When the polis of Akros is assaulted by an army of minotaurs and giants; a captive warrior, an oracle, and a thief are brought together by the chaos of battle and the goddess of Destiny.

item.itunes:summary: The party navigates the unseen passages beneath an overrun Akros to reach the safety of the Kolophon. Gron catches up with his brother. Klyx calls in a favor. Endromide struggles to keep their mouth shut.

item.title: S1 E7 - A Pandemonic Passage
item.itunes:title: A Pandemonic Passage
item.description:
Deadly foes pursue our heroes across the Ashlands and the Phoberos as they attempt to return to Akros. Klyx guidesthe party through the shadows. Gron leaps to the defense of his lifelong companion. Endromide learns a terriblesecret.

Andy Burger, Dungeon Master
Jimmy Affatigato as Gron
J. Scala as Endromide
Geppi Iaia as Klyx

Produced by Jimmy Affatigato
Music by Andy Burger
Art by Alexa Reilly

Support Pods of the Multiverse on Patreon
Join our Discord Server
Follow @multiverse_pod on Twitter
item.itunes:author: Pods of the Multiverse
item.itunes:summary: Deadly foes pursue our heroes across the Ashlands and the Phoberos as they attempt to return to Akros. Klyx guides the party through the shadows. Gron leaps to the defense of his lifelong companion. Endromide learns a terrible secret.

item.title: S1 E6 - Into the Ashlands
item.itunes:title: Into the Ashlands
item.description:
Our heroes journey across the cursed Ashlands in search of a lost temple to Klothys. The terror and sorrowsaturating these vesuvian fields have drawn all manner of evil to them. Can Klyx, Gron and Endromide survive thejourney and banish the dark forces within the temple?

Andy Burger, Dungeon Master
Jimmy Affatigato as Gron
J. Scala as Endromide
Geppi Iaia as Klyx

Produced by Jimmy Affatigato
Edited by J. Scala
Music by Andy Burger
Art by Alexa Reilly

Support Pods of the Multiverse on Patreon
Join our Discord Server
Follow @multiverse_pod on Twitter
item.itunes:author: Pods of the Multiverse
item.itunes:summary: Our heroes journey across the cursed Ashlands in search of a lost temple to Klothys. The terror and sorrow saturating these vesuvian fields have drawn all manner of evil to them. Can Klyx, Gron and Endromide survive the journey and banish the dark forces within the temple?

item.title: S1 E5 - Hardened in the Forge
item.itunes:title: Hardened in the Forge
item.description:
Klyx, Gron and Endromide escape through the mines of Mt. Velus only to stare down new dangers in One-Eyed Pass. Theparty is invited to join two feasts.

Andy Burger, Dungeon Master
Jimmy Affatigato as Gron
J. Scala as Endromide
Geppi Iaia as Klyx

Produced by Jimmy Affatigato
Music by Andy Burger
Art by Alexa Reilly

Support Pods of the Multiverse on Patreon
Join our Discord Server
Follow @multiverse_pod on Twitter
item.itunes:author: Pods of the Multiverse
item.itunes:summary: Klyx, Gron and Endromide escape through the mines of Mt. Velus only to stare down new dangers in One-Eyed Pass. The party is invited to join two feasts.

item.title: S1 E4 - Trials of Mt. Velus
item.itunes:title: Trials of Mt. Velus
item.description:
Endromide, Gron and Klyx journey to the workshop of the forge-god, only to find that the temple is about to beflooded with magma. Will the heroes be able to overcome the volcano’s guardians and escape with its treasures intime?

Andy Burger, Dungeon Master
Jimmy Affatigato as Gron
J. Scala as Endromide
Geppi Iaia as Klyx

Produced by Jimmy Affatigato
Music by Andy Burger
Art by Alexa Reilly

Support Pods of the Multiverse on Patreon
Join our Discord Server
Follow @multiverse_pod on Twitter
item.itunes:author: Pods of the Multiverse
item.itunes:summary: Endromide, Gron and Klyx journey to the workshop of the forge-god, only to find that the temple is about to be flooded with magma. Will the heroes be able to overcome the volcano’s guardians and escape with its treasures in time?

item.title: S1 E3 - Omens in the Flames
item.itunes:title: Omens in the Flames
item.description:
Endromide reunites with their former mentors. Gron apologizes for breaking a dog. Klyx stuffs some lamb shanks uphis sleeve. All of our heroes receive dire prognostications of the trials they must overcome if Akros is to besaved.

Andy Burger, Dungeon Master
Jimmy Affatigato as Gron
J. Scala as Endromide
Geppi Iaia as Klyx

Produced by Jimmy Affatigato
Music by Andy Burger
Art by Alexa Reilly

Support Pods of the Multiverse on Patreon
Join our Discord Server
Follow @multiverse_pod on Twitter
item.itunes:author: Pods of the Multiverse
item.itunes:summary: Endromide reunites with their former mentors. Gron apologizes for breaking a dog. Klyx stuffs some lamb shanks up his sleeve. All of our heroes receive dire prognostications of the trials they must overcome if Akros is to be saved.

item.title: S1 E2 - Rocky Beginnings
item.itunes:title: Rocky Beginnings
item.description:
The newly formed party make their way to the Citadel of Akros, only to learn that their destiny leads them up theperilous paths into the Katachthon mountains. The rugged wilderness tests the breadth of Gron, Klyx and Endromide’sabilities.

Andy Burger, Dungeon Master
Jimmy Affatigato as Gron
J. Scala as Endromide
Geppi Iaia as Klyx

Produced by Jimmy Affatigato
Music by Andy Burger
Art by Alexa Reilly

Support Pods of the Multiverse on Patreon
Join our Discord Server
Follow @multiverse_pod on Twitter
item.itunes:author: Pods of the Multiverse
item.itunes:summary: The newly formed party make their way to the Citadel of Akros, only to learn that their destiny leads them up the perilous paths into the Katachthon mountains. The rugged wilderness tests the breadth of Gron, Klyx and Endromide’s abilities.

item.title: S1 E1 - The Red Thread of Fate
item.itunes:title: The Red Thread of Fate
item.description:
When the polis of Akros is assaulted by an army of minotaurs and giants; a captive warrior, an oracle, and a thiefare brought together by the chaos of battle and the goddess of Destiny.

Andy Burger, Dungeon Master
Jimmy Affatigato as Gron
J. Scala as Endromide
Geppi Iaia as Klyx

Produced by Jimmy Affatigato
Music by Andy Burger
Art by Alexa Reilly

Support Pods of the Multiverse on Patreon
Join our Discord Server
Follow @multiverse_pod on Twitter
item.itunes:author: Pods of the Multiverse
item.itunes:summary: When the polis of Akros is assaulted by an army of minotaurs and giants; a captive warrior, an oracle, and a thief are brought together by the chaos of battle and the goddess of Destiny.

channel.title: Pods of the Multiverse
channel.description:
Join four friends as they explore the multiverse through various D&D settings. Each season will take place in adifferent setting, with a different DM, and a distinctly different flavor.

New episodes drop every Monday.

Support Pods of the Multiverse on Patreon
Join our Discord Server
Follow @multiverse_pod on Twitter
channel.copyright: This work is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike 4.0 International License.

item.title: S1 E9 - The Triad of Fates
item.itunes:title: The Triad of Fates
item.description:
Klyx confronts Lyucar. Gron leads the Akroans into battle against Hargot. Endromide suffers the consequences ofopening the Pyxis of Pandemonium. Gods and mortals alike look on in suspense as the fate of Akros is decided.

Andy Burger, Dungeon Master
Jimmy Affatigato as Gron
J. Scala as Endromide
Geppi Iaia as Klyx

Produced by Jimmy Affatigato
Edited by J. Scala
Music by Andy Burger
Art by Alexa Reilly

Support Pods of the Multiverse on Patreon
Join our Discord Server
Follow @multiverse_pod on Twitter
item.itunes:author: Pods of the Multiverse

item.title: S1 E8 - Solemn Reunions
item.itunes:title: Solemn Reunions
item.description:
The party navigates the unseen passages beneath an overrun Akros to reach the safety of the Kolophon. Gron catchesup with his brother. Klyx calls in a favor. Endromide struggles to keep their mouth shut.

Andy Burger, Dungeon Master
Jimmy Affatigato as Gron
J. Scala as Endromide
Geppi Iaia as Klyx

Produced by Jimmy Affatigato
Edited by J. Scala
Music by Andy Burger
Art by Alexa Reilly

item.itunes:summary: Our heroes journey across the cursed Ashlands in search of a lost temple to Klothys. The terror and sorrow saturating these vesuvian fields have drawn all manner of evil to them. Can Klyx, Gron and Endromide survive the journey and banish the dark forces within the temple?

item.title: S1 E5 - Hardened in the Forge
item.itunes:title: Hardened in the Forge
item.description:
Klyx, Gron and Endromide escape through the mines of Mt. Velus only to stare down new dangers in One-Eyed Pass. Theparty is invited to join two feasts.

Andy Burger, Dungeon Master
Jimmy Affatigato as Gron
J. Scala as Endromide
Geppi Iaia as Klyx

Produced by Jimmy Affatigato
Music by Andy Burger
Art by Alexa Reilly

Support Pods of the Multiverse on Patreon
Join our Discord Server
Follow @multiverse_pod on Twitter
item.itunes:author: Pods of the Multiverse
item.itunes:summary: Klyx, Gron and Endromide escape through the mines of Mt. Velus only to stare down new dangers in One-Eyed Pass. The party is invited to join two feasts.

item.title: S1 E4 - Trials of Mt. Velus
item.itunes:title: Trials of Mt. Velus
item.description:
Endromide, Gron and Klyx journey to the workshop of the forge-god, only to find that the temple is about to beflooded with magma. Will the heroes be able to overcome the volcano’s guardians and escape with its treasures intime?

Andy Burger, Dungeon Master
Jimmy Affatigato as Gron
J. Scala as Endromide
Geppi Iaia as Klyx

Produced by Jimmy Affatigato
Music by Andy Burger
Art by Alexa Reilly

item.itunes:author: Pods of the Multiverse
item.itunes:summary: Endromide, Gron and Klyx journey to the workshop of the forge-god, only to find that the temple is about to be flooded with magma. Will the heroes be able to overcome the volcano’s guardians and escape with its treasures in time?

item.title: S1 E3 - Omens in the Flames
item.itunes:title: Omens in the Flames
item.description:
Endromide reunites with their former mentors. Gron apologizes for breaking a dog. Klyx stuffs some lamb shanks uphis sleeve. All of our heroes receive dire prognostications of the trials they must overcome if Akros is to besaved.

Andy Burger, Dungeon Master
Jimmy Affatigato as Gron
J. Scala as Endromide
Geppi Iaia as Klyx

Produced by Jimmy Affatigato
Music by Andy Burger
Art by Alexa Reilly

item.itunes:author: Pods of the Multiverse
item.itunes:summary: Endromide reunites with their former mentors. Gron apologizes for breaking a dog. Klyx stuffs some lamb shanks up his sleeve. All of our heroes receive dire prognostications of the trials they must overcome if Akros is to be saved.

item.title: S1 E2 - Rocky Beginnings
item.itunes:title: Rocky Beginnings
item.description:
The newly formed party make their way to the Citadel of Akros, only to learn that their destiny leads them up theperilous paths into the Katachthon mountains. The rugged wilderness tests the breadth of Gron, Klyx and Endromide’sabilities.

Andy Burger, Dungeon Master
Jimmy Affatigato as Gron
J. Scala as Endromide
Geppi Iaia as Klyx

Produced by Jimmy Affatigato
Music by Andy Burger
Art by Alexa Reilly

item.itunes:summary: The newly formed party make their way to the Citadel of Akros, only to learn that their destiny leads them up the perilous paths into the Katachthon mountains. The rugged wilderness tests the breadth of Gron, Klyx and Endromide’s abilities.

item.title: S1 E1 - The Red Thread of Fate
item.itunes:title: The Red Thread of Fate
item.description:
When the polis of Akros is assaulted by an army of minotaurs and giants; a captive warrior, an oracle, and a thiefare brought together by the chaos of battle and the goddess of Destiny.

Andy Burger, Dungeon Master
Jimmy Affatigato as Gron
J. Scala as Endromide
Geppi Iaia as Klyx

Produced by Jimmy Affatigato
Music by Andy Burger
Art by Alexa Reilly
